layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x59
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 44x58
          text run at (0,0) width 44: "X "
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
        RenderInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 32x58 [color=#FF0000]
          RenderText {#text} at (43,0) size 32x58
            text run at (43,0) width 32: "Y"
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
layer at (52,8) size 50x50
  RenderImage {IMG} at (52,8) size 50x50 [bgcolor=#008000]
